lead_paragraph: KASHNER--Howard. We at Royce & Associates, LLC mourn the passing of our dear friend and colleague, Howard Kashner. Over the course of a long and distinguished association with the firm, first as Outside Counsel for Pennsylvania Mutual Fund (1968-1995) then as General Counsel for The Royce Fund (1995-2002), Howard not only embodied the virtues of intelligence, relentless integrity and fine judgement, he exemplified trust, loyalty, and true friendship to all of those with whom he worked. He was an invaluable part of our company and we will miss him greatly. 1/3
